content: make 2 stuff firmly r32 4sc change to color d 11sc 15 r1 ch8 skip 1ch increase 5sc 4sc in last chain r33 - r34 15sc 2 rounds - 15 5sc increase 18 - for left leg stop at r34 slip_stitch & f/o r2 2inc 5sc 4inc 5sc 2inc 26 - for right leg do not cut yarn r3 3sc increase 5sc increase 6sc increase 5sc increase 3sc 30 r4 blo 30sc 30 r5 - r6 30sc 2 rounnds - 30 r7 8sc 8dec 6sc 22 r8 8sc 4dec 6sc 18 r9 decrease 6sc 2dec 6sc 15 r10 - r16 15sc 7 rounds - 15 r17 flo slip_stitch ch1 x 15 slip_stitch f/o - join color d yarn into 1st fl of fl round that left from r3 to make sole s border - work 30sc slip_stitch f/o and weave in ends - join color a yarn into 1st bl of bl round that left from r17 keep working the leg up this pattern is designed by nywyn s corner and for personal use only emma pattern or parts of it may not be reproduced distributed or resold translated published altered shared or posted over for sell or free body & head @nywynscorner - from right leg continue to work 9sc - insert a piece of 17cm long craft slip_stitch ch3 then slip into the slip_stitch of left wire inside 2 arms through body leg to connect body start by next chest and an 8cm long hard plastic stitch stuff firmly straw inside the chest work up the r1 15sc on left leg 3sc on ch3 15sc neck and the head cover the straw on right leg 3sc on ch3 36 this will prevent our doll from a r2 5sc increase x 6 42 wobbly head r3 - r7 42sc 5 rounds - 42 r26 3sc decrease x 7 28 r8 5sc decrease x 6 36 r27 5sc decrease x 4 24 r9 36sc 36 r28 change to color a blo 24sc r10 4sc decrease x 6 30 24 r11 blo 30sc 30 r29 12dec 12 r12 8sc decrease x 3 27 r30 - r33 12sc 4 rounds - 12 r13 - r24 27sc 12 rounds - 27 - do not cut yarn stuff a little bit - sew 1st-2nd-3rd sts of 1st arm to 8th- around the straw inside the neck 9th-10th sts of body r24 - back to the fl round that left - sew 1st-2nd-3rd sts of 2nd arm to from r28 join color d yarn into 1st 22th-23h-24th sts of body r24 fl to crochet collar ch2 dcinc - continue to crochet r25 around 2dc x 2 dcinc half_double_crochet 2slst half_double_crochet except 12 sewed ones dcinc 2dc x 4 dcinc slip_stitch 32 r25 7sc 7sc on left arm 11sc 7sc on - f/o and weave in end right arm 3sc 35 this pattern is designed by nywyn s corner and for personal use only emma pattern or parts of it may not be reproduced distributed or
